title: Resident Evil Village Reviews, Scare Balance - Kinda Funny Games Daily 05.05.21
description:
Janet Garcia is joined by MinnMax's Ben Hanson to talk about Resident Evil Village reviews and scares, more Stadia departutes, and all the news of the day! Follow Janet at https://twitter.com/Gameonysus and follow Ben https://twitter.com/yozetty !

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:20 - Housekeeping

The Kinda Funny Gamescast Resident Evil Village review is up on youtube.com/kindafunnygames and podcast services!

Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack & Tom Bock

The Roper Report -
00:08:00 - Resident Evil Village Was Balanced on Feedback That RE7 Was Too Scary 
00:13:40 - Resident Evil Village Review Round-Up
00:22:02 - Six additional staff leave Stadia to join Haven Studios
00:29:25 - Gamescom
00:33:22 - Witcher Game Developer Quits Company Over Bullying Claims
00:43:20 - PS5 Shoes 
00:45:40 - Ad  
00:47:20 - Out today
 Reader mail -
00:51:20 - Do you guys see a future where XBox Game Pass is on a PlayStation console? - BJ Bernardo
00:53:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
